query:
SELECT
    location.id,
    location.name
FROM
    location
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
        location_id,
        COUNT(*) as count
    FROM
        market_order
    GROUP BY
        location_id
) AS market_order_count
ON market_order_count.location_id = location.id
WHERE
    ( $1::INT IS NULL OR $1 <= COALESCE(market_order_count.count, 0) )
ORDER BY
    market_order_count.count DESC
